uri.description: The uri of the GLSL source.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the GLSL source.  Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.

type.gltf_detailedDescription: The shader stage.  All valid values correspond to WebGL enums.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the shader source. Use this instead of the shader's uri property.
